plot: Leslie wants to reject a great park idea just because the designer comes from Eagleton, Tom begins his new business venture with a new fiscal approach, and Andy and April find a way to make Andy's new security job more exciting.

Pawnee Commons - Leslie and Ben meet with an architect from their rival town, Eagleton, about designs for a new park. Tom recruits the Parks Office to help him build the Rent-A-Swag store. Meanwhile, Andy does a stint as a security guard at City Hall.
